content: get ready to fall head over heels for the delicate picot doily whether you re a seasoned crocheter or a beginner looking to expand your skills this pattern is sure to provide a satisfying and enjoyable crafting experience resulting in an adorable final piece crafted with an airy lightweight construction this precious little doily comes together quickly allowing you to create a whole collection effortlessly the best part the pattern is completely free so you can indulge in your crochet cravings without worry go wild with colors and textures to achieve your perfect look no need to stick to the rules adjust the yarn weight and hook size until you find the size that s just right for you this charming doily measures about 19 cm or 7 5 inches across when crafted with crochet thread size 10 and a 1 75 mm hook this stunning doily is like a magic wand for your home decor you can drape it over a side table for a cozy vibe or get creative and turn it into a dreamy wall hanging the sky s the limit with this little gem so let your imagination run wild and create a kaleidoscope of handmade happiness
